title: INtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The Best Tech for Back to School
items.description: From laptops for any kind of coursework to scooters to get you to class on time, here's everything you need to crush this school year.

items.title: GPT-5 is supposed to be nicer now
items.description: OpenAI announced late Friday that it’s updating its latest model to be “warmer and friendlier.”

items.title: Judge says FTC investigation into Media Matters ‘should alarm all Americans’
items.description: A federal judge has blocked the FTC's investigation into Media Matters research around advertising and antisemitic content on X.

items.title: AI-powered stuffed animals are coming for your kids
items.description: Do A.I. chatbots packaged inside cute-looking plushies offer a viable alternative to screen time for kids? Maybe not.
